headline: DTE Energy (DTE) Announces That Its Smart Grid Devices Prevents Over 16,000 Outages
summary: DTE Energy Company (NYSE:DTE) is one of the Best Electric Utility Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On September 4, DTE Energy (NYSE:DTE) announced that, so far this year, its smart grid devices have prevented over 16,000 outages across the company’s electric service territory. Notably, ramping up the deployment of such smart devices remains a key component […]
